meanings.definition: A small flat piece of plastic, metal, or other material used to pluck or strum the strings of a musical instrument, typically a guitar.
meanings.sent1: I picked up one of the plectrums and started playing the guitar.
meanings.sent2: The guitarist had a collection of colorful plectrums in his pocket.
meanings.sent3: The plectrums decided to have a race to see who could pluck the strings the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the guitar strings like plectrums in a symphony of sound.
meanings.sent5: The shiny plectrums gleamed under the stage lights as the musician began to play.
